mapper.insert: INSERT INTO broadcast (user_no, schedule_no, session_id, start_time, status) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{scheduleNo}, #{sessionId}, #{startTime}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM broadcast WHERE schedule_no = #{scheduleNo} LIMIT 1
SELECT b.no AS broadcast_no, b.session_id, b.status, b.start_time FROM broadcast b WHERE b.no = #{broadcastNo}
SELECT * FROM broadcast WHERE session_id = #{sessionId} LIMIT 1

SELECT bs.name AS title, c.name AS category_name, l.name AS lawyer_name, l.profile AS lawyer_profile FROM broadcast_schedule bs JOIN category c ON bs.category_no = c.no JOIN user u ON bs.user_no = u.no JOIN lawyer l ON u.no = l.no WHERE bs.no = #{scheduleNo}

SELECT bs.name AS title, c.name AS category_name, l.name AS lawyer_name, l.profile AS lawyer_profile FROM broadcast b JOIN broadcast_schedule bs ON b.schedule_no = bs.no JOIN category c ON bs.category_no = c.no JOIN user u ON bs.user_no = u.no JOIN lawyer l ON u.no = l.no WHERE b.no = #{broadcastNo}
SELECT keyword FROM keyword WHERE schedule_no = #{scheduleNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE broadcast SET end_time = NOW(), status = 'DONE' WHERE no = #{broadcastNo}
